original_title: Charlotte Perriand, pionnière de l'art de vivre
overview: This documentary explores Perriand's development from her own perspective, from the 1930s, when she made common cause with Le Corbusier and avant-garde art, to her discovery of Japan, where she was inspired to incorporate aspects of Japanese tradition into her practice of Modernism.
title: Charlotte Perriand, Pioneer in the Art of Living
